matrix
=========

Overview
--------

a simple module to handle some matrix operations

functions
---------

matrix format

.. code:: python

    #|---| -> column
    [[1,2],[3,4]]
    # ^  +  ^ -> row

    matrix([[]])


multiplication

.. code:: python

    matrix * matrix
    matrix * int

addition

.. code:: python

    matrix + matrix

dimementions

.. code:: python

    dim(matrix)
